events.message: I recently purchased a jacket from your website, but it doesnâ€™t fit at all. I would like to request a refund for this order as soon as possible.
The report was reviewed and the case was categorized under Refund due to customer's request to return the item and get money back.
A customer service agent has been assigned to handle the refund request for the jacket order.
Hello! Thank you for reaching out. I understand you would like to return your jacket and receive a refund. I'm here to help you with that.
Could you please provide your order number and the reason for the return to help us process your refund efficiently?
My order number is 478392. The jacket is too small even though I selected the size as per your size chart, so I want to return it for a refund.
Thank you for the details. I have initiated the refund process for your order 478392. Please send the jacket back using the prepaid return label included in your package.
Thanks for your prompt help. I will send the jacket back today using the return label. Appreciate the quick response.
We received the jacket and your refund has been processed successfully. The amount should reflect in your account within 3 to 5 business days.
Just checking in to confirm if you have received your refund and if there is anything else we can assist you with.
Yes, I have received the refund today. Thank you very much for your assistance and great customer service.
We are happy to hear you received your refund. Closing the case now. Feel free to contact us anytime for future needs.
